original_title: When the Walls Talk: The Whispers Estate Documentary
overview: Nestled in a small Indiana town since 1895, Whispers Estate embodies a true paranormal haunting. Turning skeptics into believers, this house proves that its walls do more than just talk. Hear the chilling testimonies of the home owner, the staff, and numerous visitors of their encounters with the entities who reside in this home that many claim is alive
tagline: The house is alive. It knows who it wants in the house, and who it doesn't.
title: When the Walls Talk: The Whispers Estate Documentary
